Package gui

Class SubscriberInfoFrameController

java.lang.Object
gui.SubscriberInfoFrameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
public class SubscriberInfoFrameController extends Object implements IController
Controller class for managing subscriber information in the UI. Provides functionality to view, edit, and update subscriber details.
